mapper.select: select sys02_user.*, sys01_company.*, from sys02_user, sys01_company where sys02_company_id = sys01_company_id and sys02_user_id = #{userId}

select sys02_user.*, sys01_company.*, case when sys02_company_id = 2000001 then 'true' else 'false' end sys02_admin_yn from sys02_user, sys01_company where sys02_login_id = #{loginId} and sys02_passwd = #{passwd} and sys02_company_id = sys01_company_id
select sys02_user.* , sys01_company.*, from sys02_user, sys01_company where sys02_company_id = 2000001 and sys02_company_id = sys01_company_id and sys02_kor_nm like #{userName}
select sys02_user.*, sys01_company.*, from sys02_user, sys01_company where sys02_company_id = sys01_company_id and sys02_company_id = #{companyId} order by sys02_kor_nm
